fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hex a player each night.
- With the Necronomicon, deal an Astral Basic attack to a player each night and hex them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Hexed players will appear to be your role to all non-Coven investigative effects.
- Hexes cannot be removed by any means.
- When all non-Coven players are hexed, you will deal an Unstoppable attack to all hexed players.
